alert.note: Alert for Avery; Caldwell Mountains; Greater Caldwell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Caldwell and northeastern Avery Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 813 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Foscoe, or over Seven Devils, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newland, Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, Banner Elk, Sugar Mountain, Seven Devils, Grandfather Mountain State Park, B.R. Parkway-Linville Falls To Grandfather, Beech Mountain In Avery County, Patterson and Linville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
